title: Bad
author: Michael Jackson
lyrics:
[00:18.04] Ah, your butt is mine, gon' tell you right, ah
[00:22.92] Just show your face in broad daylight, ah
[00:27.17] I'm tellin' you on who I feel, ah
[00:31.32] Gonna hurt your mind, don't shoot to kill
[00:34.73] Shamone, ah, shamone
[00:37.64] Lay it on me, ah, alright
[00:43.34] Ah, I'm givin' you on count to three, ah
[00:48.09] Just show your stuff or let it be, ah
[00:52.30] I'm tellin' you, just watch your mouth, ah
[00:56.49] I know your game, what you're about
[01:00.67] Well, they say the sky's the limit
[01:02.77] And to me that's really true, ah
[01:05.03] But, my friend, you have seen nothin'
[01:06.85] Just wait 'til I get through
[01:08.74] Because I'm bad, I'm bad, shamone (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[01:12.93] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[01:15.57] You know it (really, really bad)
[01:17.19] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[01:19.71] Shamone, you know (really, really bad)
[01:21.84] And the whole world has to answer right now
[01:23.90] Just to tell you once again
[01:25.57] Who's bad?
[01:28.02] 
[01:34.67] The word is out, you're doin' it wrong, ah
[01:38.97] Gon' lock you up before too long, ah
[01:43.17] Your lyin' eyes gon' tell you right, ah
[01:47.34] So listen up, don't make a fight, ah
[01:51.50] Your talk is cheap, you're not a man, ah
[01:55.73] You're throwin' stones to hide your hands
[01:59.60] Well, they say the sky's the limit
[02:01.72] And to me that's really true, ah
[02:03.84] But, my friend, you have seen nothin'
[02:05.95] Just wait 'til I get through
[02:07.55] Because I'm bad, I'm bad, shamone (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[02:11.71] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[02:14.37] You know it (really, really bad)
[02:15.99] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[02:18.57] You know it, you know (really, really bad)
[02:20.69] And the whole world has to answer right now
[02:22.77] Just to tell you once again
[02:24.25] Who's bad?
[02:26.89] 
[02:50.18] We can change the world tomorrow
[02:52.25] This could be a better place, ah
[02:54.32] If you don't like what I'm sayin'
[02:56.42] Then won't you slap my face?
[02:57.98] Because I'm bad, I'm bad, shamone (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:02.18] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[03:05.05] You know it (really, really bad)
[03:06.67] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[03:09.26] You know it, you know (really, really bad)
[03:11.14] And the whole world has to answer right now (hoo, hoo)
[03:13.20] Just to tell you once again (hoo)
[03:15.06] You know I'm bad, I'm bad, shamone (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:19.21] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[03:21.97] You know it, you know it (really, really bad)
[03:23.73] You know, you know (bad, bad)
[03:25.69] You know, shamone (really, really bad)
[03:28.02] And the whole world has to answer right now
[03:30.14] Just to tell you once again
[03:31.72] You know I'm smooth, I'm bad, you know it (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:35.82] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:40.66] You know, you know, you know it, come on (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:44.87] And the whole world has to answer right now (hoo)
[03:46.95] Just to tell you once again (hoo)
[03:48.51] You know I'm bad, I'm bad, you know it (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:52.67] You know I'm bad, you know, woo (bad, bad, really, really bad)
[03:56.92] You know I'm bad, I'm bad (bad, bad)
[03:59.49] You know it, you know (really, really bad)
[04:01.43] And the whole world has to answer right now
[04:03.62] Just to tell you once again
[04:05.17] Who's bad?
[04:05.79]
